data.name: Arguments_CannotStartRace_Commentary
data.value: Make sure required car & track are installed and available.

data.name: Arguments_CannotInstallSetup_CommentaryFormat
data.value: RSR returned file in unsupported format.

data.name: Arguments_SharedMessage
data.comment: 0 — name, 1 — either "for" or "ID", 2 — for or ID itself, 3 — author

data.name: Arguments_Shared_ShouldApplyOrSave
data.value: Would you like to apply this preset or to save it for later?

data.name: Arguments_Shared_ShouldApply
data.value: Would you like to apply this preset?

data.name: Solution_RestoreJsonFile_Details
data.value: App will make an attempt to read known properties from damaged JSON file (be careful, data loss is possible)

data.name: Solution_SetBrandName_Details
data.value: Just set a new brand name

data.name: Solution_SetBrandNameFromName
data.value: Set brand name based on car’s name

data.name: Solution_RemoveObject_Details
data.value: Object will be removed to the Recycle Bin

data.name: Solution_GenerateNew_Details
data.value: New empty file will be created; don’t forget to set proper values and save it afterwards

data.name: Solution_MakeIndependent_Details
data.value: Remove id of missing parent from ui_car.json

data.name: Solution_ChangeParent_Details
data.value: Select a new parent from cars list

data.name: Solution_SetBrandBadge_Details
data.value: Set a brand’s badge from Content storage

data.name: Solution_ChangeBrandBadge_Details
data.value: Select a new brand’s badge from the list

data.name: Solution_RemoveReplay_Details
data.value: Replay will be removed to the Recycle Bin

data.name: Solution_SetupLivery_Details
data.value: Select a new livery icon using Livery Icon Editor

data.name: Solution_RandomLivery_Details
data.value: Generate a new livery icon using random settings

data.name: Solution_GenerateLivery_Details
data.value: Generate a new livery icon using last settings of Livery Icon Editor

data.name: Solution_SetupPreview_Details
data.value: Select a new preview through settings

data.name: Solution_GeneratePreview_Details
data.value: Generate a new preview using recently used preset

data.name: Solution_CreateEmptySkin_Details
data.value: Create a new empty skin called “default”

data.name: Solution_ChangeUpgradeIcon_Details
data.value: Select or create a new upgrade icon with the editor

data.name: Solution_SetUpgradeIcon_Details
data.value: Set an upgrade icon from Content storage

data.name: Main_OfficialSupportNotification_Details
data.value: New starter is ready, now without any patching at all

data.name: Main_OfficialSupportNotification_Message
data.value: Since 1.7 Kunos added an official support for custom launchers. Basically, it works like Starter+, but now CM doesn’t have to replace AssettoCorsa.exe, and it’s great! Would you like to switch to a new Official Starter?

data.name: Main_CannotProcessArgument_Commentary
data.value: Make sure it’s in valid format.

data.name: Settings_Appearance_LargeSearchBoxes_Tooltip
data.value: By the way, try shortcuts like F6/Ctrl+T/Ctrl+W/Ctrl+Tab/etc.

data.name: Settings_Appearance_PopupToolbars_Tooltip
data.value: Don’t forget, there is a keyboard shortcut for every button

data.name: Settings_Content_LoadingConcurrency_Tooltip
data.value: Smaller value may increase UI responsiveness, but decrease loading speed

data.name: Settings_Content_DownloadPreviews_Tooltip
data.value: I doubt you have time to update all of them

data.name: Settings_Content_FontIconSymbol_Tooltip
data.value: One symbol which will be used for an icon

data.name: Settings_CustomShowroom_TypeComment
data.value: Lite Showroom is DirectX 10-compatible, much simpler and easier for a videocard. Perfect solution for skins drawing.

data.name: Settings_CustomShowroom_DefaultType_Tooltip
data.value: Hold Ctrl when starting to select the other one

data.name: Settings_CustomShowroom_AutoAdjustPivot_Tooltip
data.value: Tries to keep a car at the center of the screen as much as possible (but without any heavy calculations)

data.name: Settings_CustomShowroom_InvertMouseButtons_Tooltip
data.value: Use left mouse button for panning and right for rotating a model instead

data.name: Settings_CustomShowroom_Bloom_Tooltip
data.value: Disable if you need maximum performance; you can toggle it any time by pressing B

data.name: Settings_CustomShowroom_Msaa_Tooltip
data.value: You can toggle it any time by pressing M

data.name: Settings_CustomShowroom_Fxaa_Tooltip
data.value: You can toggle it any time by pressing F

data.name: Settings_Drive_SkipPracticeResults
data.value: Don’t show results of Practice sessions

data.name: Settings_Drive_PreCommand_Tooltip
Settings_Drive_CMLaunch_Tooltip
data.value: This command will be executed when starting Content Manager. Working directory will be set to Assetto Corsa root folder.

data.name: Settings_Drive_PostCommand_Tooltip
Settings_Drive_CustomClouds
data.value: Replace clouds by weather clouds if exist

data.name: Settings_Drive_ConvertScreenshots
data.value: Automatically convert screenshots from BMP-format to JPEG on exit

data.name: Settings_Drive_ConvertScreenshots_Tooltip
data.value: I highly recommend to enable Magick.NET first — with it, result quality will be higher

data.name: Settings_Drive_ExpandBounds_Tooltip
data.value: Allows to set up to 999 laps and stuff, use on your own risk.

data.name: Settings_General_WindowsShortcut
data.value: Start Menu shortcut (for modern notifications, recommended)

data.name: Settings_General_WindowsShortcut_Tooltip
data.value: Create Start Menu shortcut; required for showing proper notifications in Windows 8, 8.1 and 10

data.name: Settings_General_ChangeAcRoot_Message
data.value: Do you want to change path? App will be restarted.

data.name: Settings_General_ChangeAcRoot
data.value: Change path to AC root folder

data.name: Settings_Live_RsrCustomStyle_Tooltip
data.value: Custom optimized style for built-in RSR website

data.name: Settings_Live_SrsCustomStyle_Tooltip
data.value: Custom optimized style for built-in SRS website

data.name: Settings_Live_RsrName_Tooltip
data.value: Use different name when RSR form is enabled

data.name: Settings_Live_RsrAutoToggleApp_Tooltip

data.name: Settings_Live_SrsJoinFromOnline_Tooltip
data.value: App will set a special SRS name automatically to avoid problems

data.name: Settings_Online_LoadInformationDirectly_Tooltip
data.value: Load server information directly instead of using AC servers; could be faster and more actual, but some information (such as active session) will be missing

data.name: Settings_Online_PingWithThreads
data.value: Use threads instead of asynchronous API

data.name: Settings_Online_PingWithThreads_Tooltip
data.value: The most correct pinging, but the slowest one

data.name: Settings_Online_PingConcurrency_Tooltip
data.value: Increase value to make pinging of the whole list go faster, but it’ll be less accurate

data.name: Settings_QuickSwitches_Description
data.value: Quick Switches — a small popup menu, which allows to change different settings from any place of the program. To open this menu, press Alt+~ or click middle mouse button. Also, you can change settings by pressing Alt+1…Alt+9.[br][br]If you need some new option, [url="https://acstuff.ru/app/#contacts"]please contact us[/url].

data.name: Settings_Replays_LoadInformation_Tooltip
data.value: Try to detect track, car and weather from replays for Media/Replays tab

data.name: Settings_Replays_AddExtension_Tooltip

data.name: Settings_Replays_AddExtensionToExisting_Tooltip
data.value: Add “.acreplay” extension to all existing replays

data.name: Settings_Replays_ExtensionHeader_Tooltip
data.value: With “.acreplay” extension you’ll be able to start a replay just by clicking it in Windows Explorer

data.name: Rsr_Commentary

data.name: Srs_CarIsMissing_Commentary

data.name: AppKey_PreRestart_Message
data.value:
Now app will be restarted, but it shouldn’t take long. Thanks again for your support!
[i]Please, don’t share your key, otherwise it might get compromised.[/i]

data.name: CarSpecs_SpecifyPowerAndTorqueFirst

data.name: CarSpecs_RecalculateCurvesUsingDataAndPowerTorqueHeader
data.value: Recalculate curves using data & power/torque values

data.name: CarSpecs_ScaleCurvesToPowerTorque_Tooltip
data.value: Curves will be scaled to fit power and torque values from ui_car.json (you can see them above)

data.name: CarSpecs_RecalculateCurvesUsingDataAndPowerTorque_Tooltip

data.name: CarSpecs_RecalculateCurvesUsingDataOnly_Tooltip
data.value: Curves will be recalculated based on engine.ini, but you’ll have to provide transmission loss

data.name: CarPreviews_AllEffects_Tooltip
data.value: Enable all video effects like reflections or glare (recommended)

data.name: CarPreviews_ResizePreviews_Tooltip
data.value: Resize previews to Kunos size 1022×575 (highly recommended)

data.value: Apparently SweetFX doesn’t affect the result, but could decrease loading time

data.name: CarPreviews_HideWatermark_Tooltip
data.value: Kunos watermark will be temporary hidden

data.name: CarPreviews_Manual_Tooltip
data.value: Set camera position manually and then press F8 to start shooting

data.name: CarPreviews_CannotUpdateForDisabled
data.value: Can’t update previews of disabled car or skin.

data.name: Weather_CannotShare_Commentary
data.value: Files are too big. Limit is {0}.

data.name: Weather_KunosReadme
data.value:
We are using an equation to create a graph that determines the asphalt temperature relatively to ambient temperature, weather and day time.
The equation used is: [mono](((-10×α)*x)+10*α)*2((exp(-6*x)*(0.4*sin(6*x))+0.1)*(15/1.5)*sin(0.9*x))+15[/mono]
Change the 1 values in (((-10*1)*x)+10*1) to see the results in your graphs. Accepted values are from -1 to 1.

data.name: RaceResult_MaxLevel
data.comment: Don’t forget about “: ” at the end!

data.name: RaceResult_BestCombo
data.comment: Don’t forget about “: ” at the end!

data.name: About_Description
data.value: A custom launcher and content management app for [url="http://www.assettocorsa.net/"]Assetto Corsa[/url]

data.name: About_ContactInformation
data.value: If you have any question, idea or suggestion about this app, or if you want to report some specific problem, please [url="https://acstuff.ru/app/#contacts"]contact us[/url].

data.name: About_ReportAnIssue_Prompt
data.value: Describe the issue. And, please, leave some contacts if you want to get a response (also, it could help to resolve the issue).

data.name: About_Footer
data.value: Content Manager is made possible by some [url="/Pages/About/Credits.xaml|_top"]open source and not only software[/url]. Content Manager [url="/Pages/About/License.xaml|_top"]License[/url].

data.name: Settings_Content_DisplaySkinIDsInsteadOfNames

data.name: Dialogs_AcRootDirectorySelector_AppJustHasBeenUpdatedPleaseReview
data.value: App just has been updated. Please, review if these settings are still valid:

data.name: Dialogs_AcRootDirectorySelector_AddAShortcutToStartMenu
data.value: Add a shortcut to Start Menu?

data.name: Dialogs_AcRootDirectorySelector_AddAShortcutToStartMenu_Tooltip
data.value: With it, CM will be able to use proper notifications in Windows 8, 8.1 or 10.

data.name: Dialogs_AcRootDirectorySelector_InstallSomePlugins
data.value: Would you like to install some plugins as well?

data.name: ContentTools_FilesCompressor_Description
data.value: CM scans for all models and textures (KN5 and DDS files) — those files can be well compressed, sometimes even in several times. There is not much benefit in compressing files like soundbanks or PNG images: those formats have proper compression already, and it will only slightly slow down AC loading. [br][br]I recommend to use the best compression algorithm, LZX. It will add some CPU load during loading, but CPU has nothing to do anyway while it’s waiting for disk to get the data, and there will much less data to read. [br][br]Of course, [b]it shouldn’t affect FPS in any way[/b]: AC doesn’t load resources dynamically.

data.name: AcSettings_PresetsPerMode_UpdatePresetsDuringTheRace
data.value: Update presets if some settings changed during the race

data.value: Amount of grip at the session start

data.name: AcSettings_Controls_Scanning_Hint
data.value: If it takes too long, one of devices connected to your PC might have buggy drivers. For example, Corsair K55 keyboard is known to cause this issue with DirectInput8. [url="https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10967795/directinput8-enumdevices-sometimes-painfully-slow"]More information[/url].
